segments.text: From where I'm looking, the kitchen feels warm and lived-in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, gently wiping the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”it's overflowing with water rushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That steady stream onto the floor looks so wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see it, and it's breaking my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, stretching as far as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts back, and I worry he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, her little hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but the risks are too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If anything happens, it'll be so heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful view of the garden contrasts with this tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
